full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD 'GREL SLOB DPON DBYIG GNYEN RANG GIS MDZAD PA LAS GNAS BRGYAD SNYOMS 'JUG BSTAN PA DANG GNAS DGU PA GANG ZAG 'GAG PA BSTAN PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
